interest.title: What type of products are you interested in visiting the event? (Multiple answers allowed.) *

select.col: Bedroom such as bed, bedding, dressing table

Kitchen such as ready-made kitchen set
Dining room such as dining table, bar counter
Office such as desk, bookshelf, office chair

post.dupAlert: The system has sent an SMS to you already. If you did not receive the SMS, please check your phone number or contact the staff.

none.h4: Sorry, your mobile number has already been registered
none.pStrong: We thank you for your interest in visiting our event again

success.h4: Thank you for registering to visit our event
success.pStrong: You'll receive an SMS shortly — please show the code to our staff

expire.h4: Thank you for your interest in pre-registering to visit our event
expire.p: You can register for complimentary gifts at the event

sms.h4: Please check the phone number you used to register again
sms.pStrong: We could not send the registration code to you. We apologize for the inconvenience

modalpolicy.title: Privacy Policy and Terms of Service

success_200.title: Registration Successful
success_200.text: Please check your SMS to claim your reward.

error_400.title: Registration Failed
error_400.text_1: Please verify the phone number you entered.
error_400.text_2: We are unable to send you the verification code. We apologize for the inconvenience.

warning.title: Registration Failed
warning.text: Invalid registration information. Please contact support staff.

error_404.title: Registration Failed
error_404.text_1: Sorry, this mobile number is already registered.
error_404.text_2: Thank you for your interest in our event.
